headline: Nike Data Leak Claims Test Cybersecurity And Turnaround Story
summary: Nike, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) is investigating claims from a ransomware group that say a large volume of company data has been leaked. The company has not yet confirmed the scope or authenticity of the alleged breach and is assessing potential exposure. The situation centers on sensitive internal information and raises questions about data security practices and controls. Nike, the global sportswear and footwear company, operates at the intersection of consumer brands, digital platforms, and supply...
